speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Hello.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Hey, it's me. I know you can't stand to be in the same room as me, so I just thought I'd try and apologize over the phone. All I...

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Hello.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Look I never should have kissed your girlfriend, but I'm...

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Stop callin'!!

speaker: ['Voice']
transcript: Hey! Hey! Hey! This is 92.3, WXRK, K-Rock for our $1,000 daily challenge.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: All right!

speaker: ['Voice']
transcript: What is the name of your roommate who is very, very sorry and would do anything...

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Hey!

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Hey!

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: What are you doing?

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: I'm sending back all this stuff that Chandler bought out of guilt.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Everything? Even the TV?

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: No! I'm putting that in my room.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Listen, Joey, I know what he did was wrong but don't you think you could at least hear the guy out?

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Back when you and Rachel were together, if Chandler had kissed her, would you hear him out?

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: That's a good point. So uh, how long are you gonna punish him?

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Five years.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: You've sentenced him?!

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Hey! Don't do the crime if you can't do the time.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Joey, the guy's your best friend.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: No, was my best friend. Anyway, I don't know why you're pushing for him so hard. With him out of the way as my best friend, there's a spot open.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Oh, who? Me?

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Yeah!

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Wow! I'm honored! And y'know what I'm gonna do as my first act as your best friend?

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: What?

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: I'm gonna get you to talk to Chandler.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: All right. But if you weren't my best friend.

speaker: ['Kathy']
transcript: Oh my God, is it really that bad?

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: I walk into a room and he won't even talk to me, he just mumbles something in Italian. And I know he only knows the bad words.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Hey Gunther, have you uh, have you seen Chandler?

speaker: ['Gunther']
transcript: I thought you were Chandler. But umm, one of who is over there.

speaker: ['Kathy']
transcript: Oh.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Hey Joe.

speaker: ['Doctor']
transcript: I'll be right with you. Okay? Thanks, Wendy.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Oh my God! How cute is the on-call doctor?

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Ooh, so cute, that I'm thinking about jamming this pen in my eye.

speaker: ['Nurse']
transcript: Dr. Burke will see you know.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Oh no-no-no, not Dr. Burke. Dr. Burke is out of town. The-the on-call doctor will see me now.

speaker: ['Nurse']
transcript: Dr. Richard Burke is out of town. Dr. Timothy Burke, his son, will see you now.

speaker: ['Timothy Burke']
transcript: Ready?

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Hey! I'm sorry! That- where are you going?

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: My folks.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Oh, uh, when-when are you coming back?

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: I don't know. I might stay there for a few days while I look for an apartment.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: What?!

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Yeah, y'know at first I thought we could talk about this y'know, work it out, but uh, seeing you two together I don't think I...

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Hey, look, what do you want me to say? Do you want me to say that I'll stop seeing her?

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Look, it's not about her. Okay? But seeing you two together just reminds me of what you did. And I don't want to live with some one who doesn't know what it is to be a friend. So, I'll see ya.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Hey, look, I know what it is to be a friend, I just-I just screwed up!

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Yeah! You did! And that's why I'm leaving.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: All right look, if you're not gonna stay for me, then at least stay for them! Okay, they have had a very difficult year! What with the robbery and all!

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: When that guy was robbing us, and I was locked in the entertainment unit for like six hours, you know what I was doing in there all that time? I was thinking about how I let you down!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: What?

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Yeah! But if would've know what kind of friend you were gonna turn out to be, I wouldn't have worried about it so much! See you around!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: All right, wait! Come on! Just wait one second! There has to be something that I can do! Something! If we still had that entertainment unit I would get in it for six hours and think about how I let you down. What?

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: We've got a box.

speaker: ['Timothy Burke']
transcript: Last time I saw you, it was the morning I left for college. And you were just standing outside The Dairy Queen.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: I was probably waiting for it to open.

speaker: ['Timothy Burke']
transcript: I gotta tell you, you look great now.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: You look great too.

speaker: ['Timothy Burke']
transcript: You're an excellent patient!

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: So how does it look?

speaker: ['Timothy Burke']
transcript: Well, you've got a little scratch on your cornea, your gonna have to wear a patch for a couple of days.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Like a pirate?!

speaker: ['Timothy Burke']
transcript: If that helps you.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Umm, so how long have you been working with your dad? Come on, one of us had to mention him.

speaker: ['Timothy Burke']
transcript: I moved back here a couple of months ago.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Oh. Big family dinner tonight?

speaker: ['Timothy Burke']
transcript: Uh.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: No way!

speaker: ['Timothy Burke']
transcript: I was gonna have Thanksgiving at my girlfriend's.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Oh.

speaker: ['Timothy Burke']
transcript: But we broke up.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Oh.

speaker: ['Timothy Burke']
transcript: She-she wasn't ready for a serious commitment.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Oh. So you made her walk the plank? Aye, matie?

speaker: ['Timothy Burke']
transcript: You're not wearing the patch yet.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: I know.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Oh, he sees her!

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Oh, he's catching up to her!

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Oh, she sees him! Oh, they're hugging!

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: He's taking her purse!

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Uhh, that's not them. I'm gonna go call the police.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Oh, there they are!

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: All right, get a room.
